website_summaries.verdict: The LED lighting showing when the cord is active and the triple-outlet feature make this a nice alternative to the Iron Forge.
pros: Great weather protection and solid enough to handle even high-draw electronics such as tools
Great value because of lighted, triple outlet
cons: Still a bit expensive, but at least it is available in shorter, less expensive lengths

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice cord
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice cord. All connections are tight and clean, cord is flexible and the insulation is fairly thick and tough. I use this outdoors all the time: building, trimming, tree trimming, dragged through the brush, generator use, etc, all the time and is still holding up after 15 months while still looking and working pretty much new. Can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Midniteoyl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this extension cord, I hope it holds up to our New England winter. So far it's working perfectly, and it's held up with our first snow storm. I also like that it's easy to see while shoveling, which for me, is very important. It's heavy duty, and the length is perfect for my needs. I couldn't complain about this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cotto

customer_reviews.title: I was unaware that the end is lighted when energized which is a nice feature I didn't even know I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my work shop, I wanted something durable, with a few plugs and short enough to resist tangles. it is well made and fits the bill. I was unaware that the end is lighted when energized which is a nice feature I didn't even know I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kullman

customer_reviews.title: Not what is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2.5 years ago. It was working fine but I wanted to use it elsewhere. When I went to unplug it, I couldn’t. It was fried on that on plug. I had to ruin the plug end to get it out! Amazon seems to be selling crappier and crappier stuff! To even write a review they make you search how to do that!
customer_reviews.author: DeafBASE

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty cord!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I have a DeWalt table saw & vacuum set up that need the heavy duty cord and the fact that I have the ability to move the saw around, I needed the extra length cord. (It helps that it’s nearly DeWalt yellow in color to make it look like it was a factory item.)
customer_reviews.author: Don N.

customer_reviews.title: Have not used these ext. cords yet.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these ext. cords for the sole purpose of using them with my generator. Hopefully I will not have to use them for a long time. I live in North Carolina and just survived Hurricane Florence last weekend. I did use my generator during the hurricane with some older, 18 Gauge ext. cords. They worked fine but felt a heavier gauge cord rated for outdoor use was needed. When I do use them, I will try to contact you and tell you how it went. Otherwise they seem to be quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I think we're going to enjoy this cord. We installed it, outside, to run lights and power a television around our picnic area. Yup... a TV at our picnic area. Don't be Judgy McJudgerson! Sometimes we like to just tune each other out and watch some crazy funny YouTube fails!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for about a month so far, but I'm convinced it's heavy duty enough to last a long time. I work in construction and it's been getting run over by heavy objects, stepped on, and thrown around, still good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: These are good flexible and well built cords for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Good flexible cords (even in cool weather) with multiple receptacles. Don't go cheaper at Walmart or other discount stores for rigid garbage. I have a different length for every occasion. I hate dragging out a 25 or 50 foot cord when I only need 8 feet or so! These cords bundle up easy if you know how (yes, it even takes brains to wind up a construction cord correctly) Only four stars on durability because that is to be determined (I just bought them). But I think they will do just fine!
customer_reviews.author: George G Monkey

customer_reviews.title: good value, quality!
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is! The rubber feels supple enough to not break under repeated flexing and thick enough to protect the wire. All the junctions are well built and don't anticipate them coming apart. Works great for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell
customer_reviews.text: I was asked to provide a review of an extension cord that I plan to place under my new deck to provide power along the back fence. Its too soon for a real fact based report. For example I can't rate the sturdiness or durability given its only been a couple weeks ... I would have preferred a black more discreet extension cord but only found this bright green version. Let's see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: StevCan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Was going to use this for a shed that's 75' from the house. As it turned out I only needed that usage for about 2 weeks and it performed as it should with no issues (above ground). I'll use it many times out back as the circumstance calls for it. I'm glad I have it, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Old'nCranky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little shop
customer_reviews.text: I like knowing the power is on at cord. I have a small shop but this cord brings power to middle of the room while working. allows me to have various power tools ready to use on location. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Pegavas1

customer_reviews.title: great value and great quality from a great american company.
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing bad to say about my multiple purchases from this company. this company truly deserves 5 star ratings in every aspect of their product. the quality far exceeds the price and you can tell just by looking at it that quality production was put into the product. it does not have that cheap feel like so many other companies do. it has performed flawlessly and I waited a while before writing this review just to make sure. I will only get them from watts now. they deliver on every thing a customer could want, why waste your time looking around elsewhere?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, well built.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, heavy duty, well built. Partly exposed to the weather, expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: My disappointment with this is that I purchased it PRIOR to ...
customer_reviews.text: My disappointment with this is that I purchased it PRIOR to a hurricane hitting us. It was done through prime. It did not arrive until well AFTER the hurricane, which kind of defeated the purpose! So need less to say I am very unhappy with how this transpired. As for the unit itself. I haven’t had a chance or need to use it yet. Since it arrived late! Very late!
customer_reviews.author: IWillOrderStuff

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I perform solo acoustic gigs, so it remains to be seen how well it will hold up. The "power on" LED is a nice feature. Also, the yellow color makes it less likely that somebody trips over it (most likely me).
customer_reviews.author: Zap

customer_reviews.title: Power Indicator lights up orange through the clear end
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and durable and having the extra length and feet even if you don’t need it it’s good to have it anyway and the indication when you plug it in if you have power is a good indicator as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: is a great addition without being too heavy to handle for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Watts Wire 75' 14/3 Rugged Lighted Grounded Pigtail Power Cord - 14AWG 125Vac 12Amp 1500Watt This item is suitable for almost any household single phase electrical job. From circular saws to compressors to small emergency generators this cord, with 3 socket LED indicator plugin, is a great addition without being too heavy to handle for the average person. I would recommend this 75' cord for most households.
customer_reviews.author: C King

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this cord to replace a damaged one from my 40 foot cord reel. Taking the cord reel apart was not terribly difficult, and the cord works as well as the original one, with the same abrasion resistance but more visibility because it's bright green. Good product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: It is what we ordered, needed & came on time
customer_reviews.text: As far as I know it's exactly what we need. Since we bought it for hurricane season it hasn't been used yet. We especially like that it comes from an American Co., a small one in TX & the price was great. They have contacted us & pledged to make sure it is everything it should be. Love that!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Extension Cord in tool box.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. This extension cord has become my favorite cord to use. I've been working on several projects and using my 12" Miter saw and it's the perfect size and length.
customer_reviews.author: Rsp Leather

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Not too long. Perfect size and very good price! A lot less expensive than the Yellow brand I bought in the past. Quality seems just as good for 1/2 the price. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R

customer_reviews.title: Solid Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to extend the range of my EV charger. I first tried a standard extension cord but it quickly heated up. This one works great and obviously handles the load well as it never feels warm at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Q

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cost effective way of adding electrical connectivity to two garage doors (previously with no garage openers). Your three prong heavy duty electrical cord was a tremendously cost effective solution to my problem. I expect to order another couple of cords in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Peter W.

customer_reviews.title: Green and lightens
customer_reviews.text: It is a good quality extension and I am happy for my purchase. I was taught by my father to trust only the good quality and sturdiness. I see that in this product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Anara Zhakupova

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Identifiable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for camping, plugging into the generator. It works perfectly. I wanted a cord that no one else would claim, so I got the green one. I was worried the color would get lost in the grass, but it is bright and easy to spot. We love it and would recommend it to anyone looking for a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A.

customer_reviews.title: Has a good neon light visible from all sides.
customer_reviews.text: With all three connections attachable in a row, all three cables remain flat on the floor. The neon light indicates when the power is on, also making is easy well the cables are attached and located in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Anik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent short extension cord for use with 120v power tools.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a short cord for use with 120v power tools and this fit the bill perfectly. Indicator light in the receptacle make it easy to confirm there is power at the input to the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have this running out to my new water fountain. Wish it came in black but hey this color does not show once you put rocks on it. Our plug in is by the rose bushes. How dumb right? So now I have a safe place to plug in my lawn mower without getting scratched! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Need for generator
customer_reviews.text: We were plugging in 6 or more extension cords to use our generator during last power out. These solved the problem for a good product and a great price. We are ready for next time
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Billson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty extension cord
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent, heavy duty extension cord. It works great and I especially like the lighted power indicator! I highly recommend this cord and the seller! I received a follow up email to ensure my satisfaction with the cord: terrific customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and it works. Direct replacement for another one, which was brand name. The amazon brand is as sturdy as the last, I'm surprised. I'll pick up another one in the summer for a window AC unit.a
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent extention cable
customer_reviews.text: The cable is nice and thick and doesn't kink. This might be the best extention cable i have ever owned. You can tell from the moment that you touch it, it's a quality cable.
customer_reviews.author: Berneymc

customer_reviews.title: Best cords out there that I know
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for having floodlights on an outdoor timer. Been running them for a couple years against what is advised. Nonetheless, they are heavy duty and durable. The light at the end is a great visual bonus to see that the cord has power
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Well made cord, could be a little more flexible
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be very durable, handy having the three outlets, wish it was a little more flexible. Hard to estimate durability
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Gary

customer_reviews.title: Durable and flexible, power light
customer_reviews.text: We used this for running power from our generator to our well pump. Very durable, flexible and love the verifying power light on the plug.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cord to plug the block heater and battery tender for my diesel truck in. This does the trick! Love the angle of the plugs. Makes plugging in multiple items easy
customer_reviews.author: Don Peck

customer_reviews.title: Nice 'lighted' feature cut above the rest!
customer_reviews.text: Great extension cord and works well outdoors. Lighted 3 plug head advises power is on! Nice feature to have on an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Pouliot

customer_reviews.title: Good cord.
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy cord. I like the three angles on the female end. Allows for larger plugs without conflict with the middle socket.
customer_reviews.author: 2401MrsT

customer_reviews.title: More current to the system.
customer_reviews.text: 14 Gauge from my Generator increases the current capability. Great for the PG&E power outages here!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherlock Ohms

customer_reviews.title: It's an extension cord.
customer_reviews.text: It plugs in. Things plug into it. They run. No 'shiners' to cause sparks. Good cord.
customer_reviews.author: PaulMmn

customer_reviews.title: Suits our needs
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new extension cord for the space heater. This one is so much better than what we had and the light is a good bonus for our senior eyes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable cord. Bright green cover is easy to see.
customer_reviews.text: Lighted 3 plug end is very convenient with good spacing. Plugs are lighted and durable.
customer_reviews.author: StoutDP

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as Described, Using the Extension cord for my Generator and Christmas lights!
customer_reviews.author: CaliLivin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Although I’ve only use indoors I have no doubt that it is durable enough for outdoor use too! And it lights up!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Nice cord and worth the extra $
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't the cheapest option, but worth it! It's nice quality and the 3 in one is really helpful when trying to put up sever out door decorations, less hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Jane D.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier about the outdoor extension cord! This is the only company I will get my cords from, in the future! Quality product, from a family business in Texas! You have a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great delivery time.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, function just fine and the multiple power outlet is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made extension cord
customer_reviews.text: This extension cord is well made , as well as notifying you that the power is on with small illuminating light that come on when plugged in , I also find the cord to be the perfect length For everyday use,
customer_reviews.author: D Clark

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Well Constructed Electrical Cord
customer_reviews.text: I like that the construction of this three prong extension cord is well built and heavy duty. I use for two airbeds and I like that it has the third outlet so my guests have the ability to plug a multiple charger if needed. For the price Im very satisfied with my purchase. Anyone that requires an extension cord you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Using To charge my electric vehicle..... handles the constant over night charging off pumping that much wattage into a huge car battery without overheating anywhere on the mother end of it. Feels kinda cheaply made though, not horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Williams IV

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable for outside use for a 13A lawn mower.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for outside use for my electric mower that needed the higher amperage rating. Has lasted without any hiccups for the first year so far, recommended (-_-)=b
customer_reviews.author: Mikahl

customer_reviews.title: TOP QUALITY CORD
customer_reviews.text: This extension cord is made to high quality standards. The lighted outlet end is a valuable safety indicator. Plus, the light saves time for the user because it indicates whether the cord is or is not connected to power. I am a repeat buyer of this cord from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrix Head

customer_reviews.title: Nice Extension Cord.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a good 14/3 SJTW cord. The Watt's Wire cords have the "feel" of a good, durable extension cord - only time will tell. I will buy Watt's Wire extensions when needing more.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: This thing is built like a hammer
customer_reviews.text: I like those extension cord because it has been ran over hundreds and hundreds of times by big semi trucks and I still work wonders don’t look no further
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my power tools on the recommendation of a coworker of mine. It has worked just fine since I got it and I have confidence that it will continue to perform in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for the elements
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the durability; it feels like it will last a lifetime.

customer_reviews.title: PROUDLY MADE IN TEXAS
customer_reviews.text: ANYONE SEARCHING FOR HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS SHOULDN'T LOOK ELSEWHERE. THIS WATTS WIRE FAMILY WILL SURELY MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS

customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the flexibility of the cord, considering that it has a heavy duty sheath.

customer_reviews.title: Great Extension Cord
customer_reviews.text: I really like that you can plug in more than one thing and also that it is lighted where you plug it in. I wish that I would have ordered a longer one. Will probably order a longer one just like it in the future.

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Nice cord that helps split power lines. It does what it says.

customer_reviews.title: Great cord
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable ,coils up nicely, great cord for the price

customer_reviews.title: The product was exactly as described and it shipped quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described and it shipped quickly. I use it to charge my golf cart... the lighting on the outlet is especially helpful when I have to charge my cart at night or in the early morning.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and does not over heat like most extension cords I've used in the past. I bought this for my high powered Generator and it works great. Very Pleased!!******

customer_reviews.title: Works great, exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's an extension cord. It extends. All three outlets work great. The cable feels quite durable, and it's been working fine since I received it.

customer_reviews.title: good thick heavy cord, we will see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.text: good thick heavy cord, we will see how long it lasts

customer_reviews.title: Nice cord with light up 3 way plug
customer_reviews.text: I like the 3 plug end on a bit of an angle, so it is easier to plug 3 things in at a time. The cord is thick and easy to manage. I use it to plug in lights for my outdoor riding arena

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.text: Using for household dryer.All wires I used was getting hot while using.I touched vulnerable parts of this wire while being used .Stays cool so safe.Feel comfortable knowing not to worry now.

customer_reviews.title: A well made extension cord
customer_reviews.text: Needed a short extension cord for a mini 200w heater to use while camping. This one worked well with the 200w and a 500w we tried as well; no signs of heating up at either end of the plug. The cord has a decent thickness, but still not clumsy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G. Eklund

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Everywhere I looked for the triple prong heavy duty extension cord, the price point was well over thirty dollar. I couldn't believe the very reasonable price you offered. It's exactly what I need. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Does what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.text: It was as described and it arrived quickly. I am very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Nice color easy to see even to dark

customer_reviews.text: I bought this extension cord to use on the cruise ship so I could plug in my CPAP. Worked like a charm and was especially helpful because the end lit up to show that there was power running to it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cord for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The cord is the exact length that I needed and seems to be durable and safe.

customer_reviews.title: Power when out pull the small generator out and plug in the refrigerator with no problem at all I like the flexibility

product_meta.title: 100-ft 14/3 Heavy Duty 3-Outlet Lighted SJTW Indoor/Outdoor Extension Cord by Watt's Wire - Long Yellow 100' 14-Gauge Grounded 13-Amp Three-Prong Power-Cord (100 foot 14-Awg)
feature_bullets: Watts Wire's Grounded 14-Gauge (14/3) 100-foot Multi-Outlet Lighted w/ Ground Extension Cords are the perfect cord all around. Our cords are designed around the contractor and perfect for the hobbyist.

Our heavy-duty power cords are made with an SJTW thermoplastic which is suitable to temperatures from -40°F to 130°F. Our double jacketed cords won't mar walls or floors but will stand up to concrete!
Our cords use 14-Gauge soft-drawn copper to give 120V 13-amps with minimal voltage drop providing all the power you require! Our multi-tap pig-tail power splitter is the best on the market!
Our cords include strength adding poly strands in the cord to make it handle heavy day after day use. These can support up to 150lbs without damage! Don't waste time with a half-strength competitor!
Designed to OSHA and UL 817 requirements! Corrosion, fire and moisture resistant; with built-in strain-relief and unbreakable molded NEMA 5-15 (US) plugs.
